title: "10th October: Change"
author: "Tanya"
---



### Change

We will be exploring correlation.



::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(tidyverse) # Tidy data processing and plotting
```

```{.r .cell-code}
library(ggExtra) # Making Combination Plots

```

```{.r .cell-code}
glimpse(penguins)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
Rows: 344
Columns: 8
$ species           <fct> Adelie, Adelie, Adelie, Adelie, Adelie, Adelie, Adel…
$ island            <fct> Torgersen, Torgersen, Torgersen, Torgersen, Torgerse…

$ bill_depth_mm     <dbl> 18.7, 17.4, 18.0, NA, 19.3, 20.6, 17.8, 19.6, 18.1, …
$ flipper_length_mm <int> 181, 186, 195, NA, 193, 190, 181, 195, 193, 190, 186…
$ body_mass_g       <int> 3750, 3800, 3250, NA, 3450, 3650, 3625, 4675, 3475, …
$ sex               <fct> male, female, female, NA, female, male, female, male…
$ year              <int> 2007, 2007, 2007, 2007, 2007, 2007, 2007, 2007, 2007…
```


:::
:::



#### Data Munging



::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
penguins_quant <- penguins %>%
  drop_na() %>%
  select(where(is.numeric))
penguins_quant
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
# A tibble: 333 × 5
   bill_length_mm bill_depth_mm flipper_length_mm body_mass_g  year
            <dbl>         <dbl>             <int>       <int> <int>
 1           39.1          18.7               181        3750  2007
 2           39.5          17.4               186        3800  2007
 3           40.3          18                 195        3250  2007
 4           36.7          19.3               193        3450  2007
 5           39.3          20.6               190        3650  2007
 6           38.9          17.8               181        3625  2007
 7           39.2          19.6               195        4675  2007
 8           41.1          17.6               182        3200  2007
 9           38.6          21.2               191        3800  2007
10           34.6          21.1               198        4400  2007
# ℹ 323 more rows
```


:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
penguins_quant %>%
  gf_point(body_mass_g ~ flipper_length_mm) %>%
  gf_lm() %>%
  gf_labs(
    title = "Scatter Plot",
    subtitle = "Penguins :body mass vs flipper length"
  )
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}

```
Warning: Using the `size` aesthetic with geom_line was deprecated in ggplot2 3.4.0.
ℹ Please use the `linewidth` aesthetic instead.
```


:::

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](index_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-4-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
penguins_quant %>%
  gf_point(bill_length_mm~ bill_depth_mm) %>%
  gf_lm() %>%
  gf_labs(
    title = "Scatter Plot",
    subtitle = "Penguins :bill length vs bill depth"
  )
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](index_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-5-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
penguins_quant %>%
  gf_point(bill_length_mm~ body_mass_g) %>%
  gf_lm() %>%
  gf_labs(
    title = "Scatter Plot",
    subtitle = "Penguins :bill length vs body mass"
  )
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](index_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-6-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
penguins_quant %>%
  gf_point(bill_depth_mm~ body_mass_g) %>%
  gf_lm() %>%
  gf_labs(
    title = "Scatter Plot",
    subtitle = "Penguins :bill depth vs body mass"
  )
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](index_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-7-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
penguins %>%
  drop_na() %>%
  gf_point(body_mass_g ~ flipper_length_mm,
    color = ~ species) %>%
  gf_lm() %>%
  gf_labs(
    title = "Scatter Plot",
    subtitle = "Penguins: Trends by Species"
  )
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](index_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-8-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::
